headline: Con Edison to Report 2024 Earnings on February 20
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) plans to report its 2024 earnings on February 20, 2025 after the market closes.

raw.headline: Con Edison to Report 2024 Earnings on February 20
raw.summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) plans to report its 2024 earnings on February 20, 2025 after the market closes.

headline: CON EDISON DECLARES COMMON STOCK DIVIDEND
summary: Consolidated Edison, Inc. (Con Edison) (NYSE: ED) declared a quarterly dividend of 85 cents a share on its common stock, payable March 14, 2025 to stockholders of record as of February 19, 2025, an annualized increase of 8 cents over the previous annualized dividend of $3.32 a share.
